author: Caitlin Welsh
title: Stephen Colbert loses it over Trump's pointless, personal coronavirus tantrums
description: It's Tuesday, we think, and everyone's just about done with this week already. After just a couple of clips of President Trump bitching at White House reporters who asked perfectly reasonable questions about coronavirus testing, Stephen Colbert traded his hom…
